PresentationColumn.name: Approved Budget Amount (Marketing Plan)
PresentationColumn.Description: this metric sums the approved budgets

PresentationColumn.name: Authorised Spend
PresentationColumn.Description: Budget Assigned for individual marketing cost / expense (marketingcost.assigned budget amount)

PresentationColumn.name: Average Cost Per Contact
PresentationColumn.Description: Total marketing spend / number of supporters targeted (Total marketing spend / number of supporters targeted)

PresentationColumn.name: Cost Per Item
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric simply divides the number of items by the total marketing cost. Ideally this metric needs to be used with a cost centre / account code and a campaign to produce meaningful results (marketingcost.actual amount / # of items)

PresentationColumn.name: Marketing Cost (Forecasted)
PresentationColumn.Description: Forecasted Marketing Cost for individual item

PresentationColumn.name: Number of Items (Actual)
PresentationColumn.Description: The actual number of items recieved

PresentationColumn.name: Number of Items (Forecasted)
PresentationColumn.Description: The forecasted number of expense items for a campaign

PresentationColumn.name: Price Per Pack
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the average pack cost based on the volume of packs (if marketingcost.account code = '3615 FULFILMENT FEE' and marketingcost.cost centre= 'NE2021' then marketingcost.actual amount)

PresentationColumn.name: Race Day Costs
PresentationColumn.Description: this metric calculates the marketing costs associated with an event based on account code and cost centre. (IF Marketing cost.COST CENTRE = 'NE2001' then Marketing.actual cost )

PresentationColumn.name: Requested Budget Amount
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric sums the requested budgets for campaigns

PresentationColumn.name: Variance Campaign Authorised Spend
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric compares the actual marketing expenditure against the budget approved for a campaign. This metric is at the campaign level and should be used with a campaign.

PresentationColumn.name: Variance from Budget Approved Spend
PresentationColumn.Description: This metric calculates the difference between the actual marketing expenditure against the approved budget. (Approved budget - Requested Budget )

PresentationColumn.name: Campaign Authorised Spend
PresentationColumn.Description: Approved budget for a Campaign (campaign.budget amount)

PresentationColumn.name: Campaign Budgets YTD
PresentationColumn.Description: Sum of campaign budgets calendar year to date (if campaign.startdate < today then campaign.budget)
